array.name: prehour3_eng
array.item: †\nTHIRD HOUR PRAYER

The Prayer of the Third Hour of this blessed day we offer to Christ our King and God, beseeching Him to forgive us our sins. From the Psalms of our teacher, David the prophet and the king, may his blessings be with us all, Amen.

array.name: prehour3_kis
array.item: †\nMAOMBI YA SAA TATU

Maombi ya Saa Tatu ya siku hii iliyobarikiwa, tunamtolea Kristo Mfalme wetu na Mungu wetu, tukimwomba atusamehe dhambi zetu. Kutoka kwa Zaburi na nyimbo za mwalimu wetu, Daudi nabii na mfalme, baraka zake ziwe nasi sote, Amina.

array.item: †\nMAOMBI YA SAA KUMI NA MBILI

Maombi ya Saa KUMI NA MBILI ya siku hii iliyobarikiwa, tunamtolea Kristo Mfalme wetu na Mungu wetu, tukimwomba atusamehe dhambi zetu. Kutoka kwa Zaburi na nyimbo za mwalimu wetu, Daudi nabii na mfalme, baraka zake ziwe nasi sote, Amina.

array.name: prehourMidnight_1Watch_eng
array.item: †\nMIDNIGHT PRAYER

In the name of the Father, and the Son, and the Holy Spirit, One God. Amen. Kiryeleison, Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy, Lord bless us. Amen. Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit, now and forever and ever, Amen.
FIRST WATCH

Rise children of light, praise the Lord of hosts, may he bestow upon us the salvation of our souls. When we stand up bodily before You, take away from us the sleep of carelessness, and give us alertness, so we may learn how to stand before You at the time of prayer and send up to You appropriate glorification to gain forgiveness of our sins.
GLORY BE TO YOU, O LOVER OF MANKIND.

array.name: prehourMidnight_1Watch_kis
array.item: †\nMAOMBI YA USIKU WA MANANE

Kwa Jina la Baba na la Mwana na la Roho Mtakatifu Mungu Mmoja. Amina Kiryeleison, Bwana utuhurumie, Bwana utuhurumie, Bwana utubariki. Amina. Utukufu uwe kwa Baba, na Mwana, na Roho Mtakatifu, sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
IBADA YA KWANZA

Amkeni enyi wana wa mwanga, ili tumwimbie Bwana wa uwezo ili aweze kutuneemesha na wokovu wa nafsi zetu. Kama vile tumesimama mbele zako kwa miili yetu, utuondolee katika akili zetu kulala kwa sinzia. Ee Bwana utupe uwezo wa kukesha ili tufahamu jinsi ya kusimama mbele yako wakati wa sala, na tukitumia utukufu unaofaa kwako na tupate msamaha wa dhambi zetu nyingi.
UTUKUFU UWE KWAKO, EWE MPENDA WANADAMU.

array.name: prehourMidnight_2Watch_eng
array.item: †\nSECOND WATCH

array.name: prehourMidnight_3Watch_eng
array.item: †\nTHE THIRD WATCH

The Third Watch of the Midnight Prayer of this blessed day we offer to Christ our King and God, beseeching Him to forgive us our sins. From the Psalms of our teacher, David the prophet and the king, may his blessings be with us all, Amen.

array.name: prehourMidnight_3Watch_kis
array.item: †\nIBADA YA TATU

Ibada ya Tatu ya Usiku Wa Manane ya siku hii iliyobarikiwa, tunamtolea Kristo Mfalme wetu na Mungu wetu, tukimwomba atusamehe dhambi zetu. Kutoka kwa Zaburi na nyimbo za mwalimu wetu, Daudi nabii na mfalme, baraka zake ziwe nasi sote, Amina.

array.name: exhour3_eng
array.item: LITANIES

O Good Lord, do not take Your Holy Spirit away from us, this which You sent upon Your holy disciples and honorable apostles at the third hour. Create a pure heart in me, O God and put a new and loyal Spirit within me, do not banish me from Your presence and do not take Your Holy Spirit from me.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

O Lord, who sent Your Holy Spirit upon the holy disciples and honorable apostles at the third hour, do not take this away from us, O righteous Lord. We ask You our Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of God the Logos, renew within us a right and life giving spirit, a filial spirit of chastity, holiness, justice and authority. Our Almighty God, the light of our souls, illuminating every person who comes into this world, have mercy upon us.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.

Mother of God, full of grace, you are the true vine that carries the fruit of life. We ask you and all the apostles to pray for the salvation of our souls. Blessed be the Lord our God whom we praise each day, because He prepares our path as He is the God of our salvation.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages .Amen.

O Heavenly King, the Spirit of truth, the comforter, who is everywhere and fills everybody. You are the treasure of goodness and giver of life, we ask You to graciously come and dwell within us, purify us from iniquity and save our souls.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
Lord, abide with us as You did with the apostles, when You gave them Your peace, we ask You to grant us Your peace, our Savior; save us and spare our souls.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages .Amen.
Whenever we stand in Your Holy Temple, we are considered as those who abide in heaven. O Mother of God, you are the gate of heaven, open to us the door of mercy.
O Lord, hear us and have mercy upon us, and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour3_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Roho wako Mtakatifu uliyemtuma kwa wanafunzi wako watakatifu na mitume wako waheshimiwa saa tatu usimuondoe ndani yetu ee mwema lakini mfanye mpya ndani yetu, uniumbie moyo safi ee Mungu, fanya roho yangu isimame imara, usinifukuze mbele yako na usiniondolee Roho wako Mtakatifu.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Ee Bwana wewe ambaye kwenye muda wa saa tatu ulituma Roho Mtakatifu wako kwa mitume wako watakatifu na wafuasi wako waheshimiwa, usituondolee hii ee Bwana mwema, lakini umfanye mpya ndani yetu, tunaomba ee Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo, Mwana wa Mungu, Neno, Roho mwema, mpaji wa uzima, Roho safi wa mwana, Roho wa utakaso, uwema na utawala, Ee Mwenyezi, kwani wewe ndiwe mwanga wa nafsi zetu, wewe uangazae yeyote ajaye ulimwenguni, utuhurumie.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee Mama wa Mungu, uliye shina la mzabibu uliyemzaa Kristo tunda la uzima, uliye jaa neema, tunakuomba pamoja na mitume kwa ajili ya wokovu wa nafsi zetu. Abarikiwe Bwana Mungu wetu, abarikiwe siku kwa siku, atubariki tuwe na maisha ya mafanikio.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee mfalme wa mbingu, mfariji, Roho wa kweli, aliye popote, na kujaza wote, hazina ya wema na mpaji wa uzima, uje kwa neema yako ee mwema na uishi ndani yangu, na utuoshe kwa uchafu wetu ee mwema na uokoe nafsi zetu.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Jinsi ulivyokuwa na wanafunzi wako Ee Mwokozi na ukawapa amani, uwe nasi pia na utupe amani yako, na utukomboe na utuokoe nafsi zetu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
Wakati wowote tukisimama ndani ya hekalu lako takatifu, tunalingana na waliosimama mbinguni. Ee Mama wa Mungu, wewe ni lango la mbinguni, utufungulie lango la huruma.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour6_eng
array.item: LITANIES

Lord, who on the sixth day, at the sixth hour You were nailed to the Cross for the sin that Adam dared to commit in paradise. Abolish the record of our sins, Lord Christ and save us. I cried to the Lord and He heard me. Lord accept my prayer and answer my supplication, hear me in the evening and in the morning and at noon. Hear my words and spare my soul.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

O Jesus Christ, our God, who was nailed to the Cross at the sixth hour. You mortified sin by the cross, by your death You raised the dead; that is man, whom You created with Your hands, who died to sin. Slay our sufferings by Your healing and life-giving pas- sion, and by the nails with which You were nailed save our minds from foolishness and worldly desires to the remembrance of Your heavenly judgements, according to Your tender mercies.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.

Because of our many sins, we are without liberty, pretext or excuse, we can only plead to You, O Virgin Mary, mother of God, to pray to whom you gave birth, because your supplications are acceptable to our Savior. O Pure Mother, do not turn the sinners back, plead for them, because He to whom you gave birth is the merciful redeemer; He suffered to rescue us. O Lord, we are helpless, we badly need Your compassion, help us for the sake of Your glory; O God, save us and forgive our sins for the sake of Your Holy Name.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.
O Lord Christ, you gave salvation to the whole world when You spread Your undefiled hands on the cross, for this all nations give You praise saying: “Glory be to You, O Lord.”
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

O Good Lord, we worship Your incorruptible person, praying for the remission of our sins, for You were pleased to go willingly to the cross to rescue Your creation from the slavery of the enemy. We cry out to You and and thank You, O Savior, for You filled us all with joy when You came to help the world. Lord, glory be to You.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.

O Mother of the Lord, full of grace, Virgin Mary, we praise you, for through the Cross of your Son, hades has fallen and death destroyed. We were dead before, but we have been raised, and made worthy to inherit eternal life and to regain paradise, for this we thankfully glorify our immortal Lord Jesus.O Lord, hear us and have mercy upon us, and forgive us our sins. Amen.
O Lord hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour6_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Wewe uliyeangikwa msalabani siku ya sita saa sita kwa ajili ya dhambi Adamu aliyofanya paradiso, ufute maandishi yote ya dhambi zetu kwenye kitabu chako, Ee Kristo Bwana, na utuokoe. Nilimlilia Mungu na akanisikia, Bwana pokea maombi yangu, na usikatae dua yangu. Ee Bwana unisikilize nikikuomba jioni, asubuhi na adhuhuri. Nikikuomba, Bwana uisikie sauti yangu na kuipokea roho yangu kwa amani.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Ee Kristo Yesu Bwana wetu uliyesulubishwa msalabani saa sita mchana, ulishinda dhambi mtini kwa kifo chako, Ee Bwana uliyeleta uzima kwa wafu uliowaumbakwa mikono yako kupitia kifo chako, komesha maumivu yetu kwa uponyaji wako na kwa misumari uliyopigiliwa nayo. Okoa fikira zetu kwa wazo la dunia na tamaa zote. Geuza fikira zetu kwa ukumbusho wa amri zako za mbinguni kupitia kwa huruma zako kuu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Kwa vile hatuna udhuru kwa ajili ya dhambi zetu nyingi, tunakuomba ee Bikira mama wa Mungu, utuombee kwa mwana wako kwa maana dua zako zina nguvu mbele ya mwokozi. Ee mama mwema usitukatae sisi wenye dhambi kwa dua yako kwa mwanako. Kwa kuwa ana huruma nyingi na anaweza kutuokoa kwa sababu aliteseka ili atukomboe. Hebu huruma zako zitufikie kwa kuwa tumepungukiwa, utusaidie Ee Bwana mwokozi wetu kulingana na utukufu wa jina lako. Bwana utuokoe na utusamehe dhambi zetu kulingana na jina lako takatifu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
Ee Kristo Mungu wetu uliyeleta wokovu katikati ya ulimwengu wote, lini uliponyoosha mikono yako safi mtini, kwa hivyo kila taifa wanakulilia wakisema “Utukufu uwe kwako Ee Bwana”.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Tunakusujudu wewe usiye na hatia, Ee mwema na kuomba msamaha wa dhambi, Kristo Mungu wetu. Na kwa mapenzi yako ulifurahi kwenda msalabani kuokoa wale uliowaumba kutokana na kifungo cha adui. Tunalia na kutoa shukrani kwako kwa kuwa umejaza wote na furaha, Ee Mwokozi, wakati ulikuja kusaidia dunia. Utukufu uwe kwako Ee Bwana.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Wewe umejaa neema Ee Bikira Maria Mama wa Mungu. Tunakusifu kwani kupitia kwa msalaba wa mwanako, kuzimu kumeporomoshwa na kifo kimebatili. Tulikufa lakini sasa tumefufuka na tukapewa neema ya uzima wa milele na tukapewa furaha ya paradiso ya kwanza. Kwa hiyo, kwa shukrani tunakutukuza Kristo asiyekufa, Mungu wetu.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour9_eng
array.item: LITANIES

O Lord who tasted death in the flesh at the ninth hour for our sake, we the sinners; mortify our carnal senses, O Christ our God, and deliver us. Let my supplication draw near You, O Lord. Give me understanding, according to Your wisdom. Let my request reach Your presence and give me life through Your word.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

At the ninth hour You surrendered Your soul to the hands of the Father, after being hanged on the cross. You guided the thief to join You in paradise, do not forget or reject me for I have strayed. Sanctify my soul, enlighten my mind and let me partake of the grace of Your sacraments so that when I taste Your goodness, I offer You praise unceasingly, longing for Your light above all things O Christ our Lord, save us.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

You were born of the virgin, for our sake and endured crucifixion, O Righteous Lord, with Your death You defeated death, with Your resurrection You made eternal life manifest. Do not turn Your face from those whom You made by Your hands. Show Your love to mankind O Good Lord. Accept the supplications of Your virgin mother on our behalf. O Savior, spare Your humble people and do not let us perish, do not revoke Your promise and do not deprive us of Your mercy for the sake of Your beloved Abraham, your servant Isaac and Israel Your saint.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

When the thief saw the giver of life hanging on the cross, he said; “Had not the one crucified with us being the incarnate God, the sun would not have hidden its light, nor would the earth have quaked in fear. Remember me Almighty Lord when You come into Your Kingdom.”
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

O Righteous Lord who received the confession of the thief on the cross, accept us who deserve the judgement of death because of our sins. We join him in acknowledging our sins and in confessing Your divinity saying: “Lord remember us when You come into Your Kingdom.”
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

When the mother saw the Lamb, the Shepherd and Savior of the world hanging on the cross, she wept and said: “The world rejoices at the acceptance of salvation, but my heart burns when I look at your crucifixion which You endured for the sake of all; O My Son and My God.”.
O Lord hear us, have mercy upon us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour9_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Ee Bwana uliyeonja kifo kwa mwili wakati wa saa tisa kwa ajili yetu, sisi wenye dhambi. Ua tamaa zetu za mwili, ewe Kristo Mungu wetu, na utukomboe. Hebu sala zangu zikufikie ee Bwana. Unipe maelewano kulingana na hekima zako. Maombi yangu iweze kufika katika uwepo wako na unipe uzima kupitia kwa neno lako.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

"Wakati wa saa tisa ulisalimisha roho yako mikononi mwa Baba, baada ya kuangikwa msalabani. Ulimwongoza mnyang'anyi aweze kuwa pamoja na wewe katika Paradiso. Usisahau nami wala usinikatae mimi mkosaji, lakini takasa nafsi wangu, angaza akili yangu na ukubali niweze kupokea neema za sakramenti zako ili nikionja uwema wako, nikusifu bila kikomo, nikitamani mwanga wako zaidi ya vitu vyote, na utuokoe ee Kristo Bwana wetu."
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee Bwana mwema, ulizaliwa kwa Bikira na ukavumilia kuangikwa kwa ajili yetu, ulishinda kifo kupitia kifo chako, na kupitia ufufuko wako umedhihirisha uzima wa milele. Usigeuze uso wako kwa wale uliyowaumba kwa mikono yako. Ee Bwana mwema, uoneshe binadamu upendo wako. Kubali dua za Bikira mama yako kwa niaba yetu. Ee Mwokozi, okoa watu wako wanyenyekevu na usifanye tuangamie, usikatae na ahadi yako wala usitunyime huruma zako kwa ajili ya mpendwa wako Abrahamu, mtumishi wako Isaka na Israeli, Yakobo, mtakatifu wako.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

"Wakati mnyang'anyi alimwona mtoa uhai ameangikwa msalabani, alisema, "Kama huyu aliyeangikwa pamoja nasi hangekuwa ni Mungu aliyechukua mwili. Basi jua halingeweza kuficha mwanga wake wala dunia haingeweza kutetemeka kwa hofu. Unikumbuke ee Bwana, utakapokuja katika ufalme wako.""
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

"Ee Bwana wa haki, ulipokea maungamo ya mnyang'anyi aliyeangikwa pamoja nawe msalabani, tunakuomba utukubali, ijapokuwa dhambi zetu zinazotuhukumu kifo, tunaungana pamoja naye kwa kuelewa dhambi zetu na kutangaza uungu wako tukisema: "Utukumbuke ee Bwana utakapokuja katika ufalme wako.""
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Wakati mama alimwona Mwana kondoo, Mchungaji na Mwokozi wa ulimwengu ameangikwa msalabani, alilia na kusema: “Dunia inafurahi kwa kukubali wokovu lakini moyo yangu inaungua nikikutazama jinsi ulivyo angikwa msalabani uliyoyavumilia kwa ajili ya wote; Ee Mwana wangu na Mungu wangu”.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour11_eng
array.item: LITANIES

If the righteous one is scarcely saved, where shall I, the sinner, appear. Because of my human weakness I cannot bear the burden and the heat of the day. But, You the merciful God, count me among those of the eleventh hour. In sin my mother conceived and gave birth to me, I should not dare look up to heaven, but because of Your great mercy and love to humanity, I call to You saying: “Lord forgive my sins and have mercy upon me.”
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

Take me now, my Savior, into Your Fatherly embrace because I have spent my life in pleasures and desires, my time is running out, now I depend on Your rich and infinite compassion. Do not disregard a humble heart who needs Your mercy, I cry to You with reverence, “I have sinned against You and against Heaven, I am no longer fit to be called Your son, treat me as one of Your hired workers.”
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

I practiced evil with diligence and enthusiasm, with earnestness and keenness I committed each sin. For this I deserve suffering and condemnation. Our Lady Virgin Mary, guide me to the means of repentance, to you I plea, through you I seek supplication, I call you for help, lest I fail. Come to my rescue, when my soul departs from my body, defeat the conspiracies of the enemy, shut the gates of hell lest they swallow my soul. O blameless bride of the true Lord.
O Lord hear us, have mercy upon us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour11_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Kama mwenye haki ataokolewa kwa shida, je, mimi nisiye mcha Mungu na mwenye dhambi nitakuwa wapi? Kwa ajili ya udhaifu wangu wa kibinadamu siwezi kuvumilia mzigo huu wala joto la siku hii. Ee Mungu mpendwa, unao jawa na huruma, unihesabu miongoni mwa wale wa saa kumi na moja. Mimi mdhambi, na mama yangu alinichukuwa mimba hatiani, sistahili kutazama mbingu, lakini kwa huruma zako nyingi na upendo wako kwa wanadamu, mimi nakulilia nikisema; "Bwana unisamehe dhambi zangu na unihurumie".
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Unichukue sasa, ee Mwokozi, na unifungulie kifua cha Ubaba wako kwa sababu nimetumia maisha yangu katika raha na tamaa nyingi, muda wangu sasa umeyoyoma, hivyo nategemea tu huruma zako zisizo na kipimo. Usikatae moyo mnyofu unaohitaji huruma zako, nakulilia kwa hofu; "Baba, nimekosa juu ya mbingu na mbele yako, sistahili kuitwa mwana wako, lakini, nifanye kama mmoja wa watumishi wako."
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Nilitenda dhambi kwa uangalifu na kwa furaha, nikiwa na tamaa na kwa umakini nilifanya kila dhambi. Kwa ajili ya hayo ninastahili mateso na hukumu. Ewe Bikira Mariamu mama yetu, uniongoze katika njia ya toba, kwako ninakulilia, kupitia kwako ninatafuta maombi, ninakuita unisaidie, nisije kuanguka. Njoo unisaidie wakati nafsi wangu unaacha mwili wangu, unishindie mapatano mabaya ya adui, funga milango za kuzimu ili wasimeze nafsi wangu. Ee wewe Bikira asiye na dosari bi harusi ya Bwana wa kweli.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhour12_eng
array.item: LITANIES

Behold, I am about to stand before the just judge in fear because of my numerous sins, for the life spent in pleasures deserves condemnation. Repent therefore, O my soul so long as you dwell on earth, for the dust in the grave offers no praise, and amongst the dead no one remembers, nor those who are in Hades, give thanks. Rise up from your laziness and implore the Savior in repentance, saying; Lord have mercy upon me and save me.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

If this life was everlasting and this world eternal, O my soul, you would have a valid excuse. But if your wicked deeds and repulsive evils are exposed before the just judge, what answer would you give when you are lying on the bed of sin and failed to subject the body. O Christ, our God, before Your fearful throne of judgment I am terrified, and before Your counsel of judgment I am in awe, and unto the light of Your divinity I tremble, I am the wicked and defiled, lying on my bed careless about my life. Yet I imitate the tax collector beating on my chest saying; “God be merciful to me a sinner.”
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

O Pure virgin, cast the shadow of your assistance on your servant. Remove the evil thoughts and raise my frail soul to stay awake and pray, because it has been lying long in deep sleep. You are a capable, merciful and helpful Mother, the Mother of the Spring of life, my King and God, Jesus Christ, my hope.

array.name: exhour12_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Tazama, niko karibu kusimama mbele ya Hakimu Mwenye Haki nikiwa na hofu kwa ajili ya dhambi zangu nyingi, kwa maana maisha iliyofanywa kwa ridhaa inahitaji hukumu. Kwa hivyo, utubu ee nafsi wangu, wakati bado unaishi duniani, kwa sababu vumbi ya kaburi haiwezi kutoa sifa, na kati ya wafu hakuna anaye weza kumbuka, wala walio jehanamu hawawezi kushukuru. Amka kutoka uzembe wako na umwombe Mwokozi kwa kutubu ukisema, "Bwana unihurumie na uniokoe."
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Kama ingalikuwa maisha ya sasa ni wa milele na ulimwengu huu pia hauna mwisho, basi, ee nafsi wangu, ungekuwa na udhuru. Lakini ikiwa matendo yako maovu pamoja na udhaifu wako utawekwa wazi mbele ya Hakimu wenye Haki, wewe utajibu nini? Wewe umelala kwenye kitanda cha dhambi huku hauna uwezo wa kuongoza mwili. Ee Kristo, Mungu wetu, nina tetemeka mbele ya kiti chako cha enzi ya hukumu, na mbele ya baraza lako ya hukumu nina hofu, na hata mbele ya mwanga wako wa uungu nina tetemeka mno. Mimi ni mdhaifu na nina dosari, nimelala kwa kitanda changu kwa uzembe bila kujali maisha yangu. Hivyo, ninaiga mtoza ushuru huku nikipiga kifua changu nikisema; “Ee Mungu, unisamehe, mimi ni mdhambi”.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee Bikira msafi, umfunike mtumishi wako kwa kivuli chako cha msaada. Uniondolee mbali fikira mbaya na uinue nafsi wangu mdhaifu kwa kukesha na kusali, kwa kuwa imekaa kwa muda mrefu katika usingizi mzito. Kwa kuwa wewe ni mama mwenye uwezo, mwenye huruma na wa msaada sana, mama wa chemchemi wa uzima, mfalme wangu na Mungu wangu Yesu Kristo, tumaini langu.

array.name: exhourMidnight_1Watch_eng
array.item: LITANIES

Behold, the bridegroom comes at midnight. Blessed is the servant whom He finds awake, But he who is found in slumber does not deserve to go with Him. Keep your watch my soul, Lest You go to sleep and be thrown outside the Kingdom. Keep awake and shout: Holy, Holy, Holy are You God, for the sake of the Mother of God, have mercy upon us.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

Remember my soul that awesome day, awake and light your lamp with the oil of joy for you do not know when the voice will call: “Behold, here comes the bridegroom”. Watch, my soul, that you do not fall asleep lest you should stay outside knocking like the five foolish virgins. But watch with prayers in order to meet the Lord, Christ, with rich oil. He will bestow upon you the joys of His true divine glory.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

O Virgin Mother of God, You are the bastion of our salvation, our impregnable fortress, suppress the conspiracies of the enemy, transform our sorrows into joy, fortify our city, protect those who govern us, plead for the peace of the world, for You are our hope, O Mother of God.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

O Heavenly King, the Spirit of truth, the comforter, who is everywhere and fills everybody. You are the treasure of goodness and giver of life, we ask You to graciously come and dwell within us, purify us from iniquity and save our souls.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
Lord, abide with us as You did with the apostles, when You gave them Your peace, we ask You to grant us Your peace, our Savior; save us and spare our souls.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.
Whenever we stand in Your Holy Temple, we are considered as those who abide in heaven. O Mother of God, you are the gate of heaven, open to us the door of mercy.
O Lord Hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhourMidnight_1Watch_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Tazama, bwana arusi anakuja usiku wa manane. Heri mtumishi ambaye Bwana atamkuta akiwa macho. Lakini yule ambaye atamkuta akilala hataingia ndani naye. Ee nafsi yangu usiwe mzito kwa usingizi, la sivyo utapatikana nje ya ufalme, lakini uwe macho huku ukisema: “Mtakatifu, Mtakatifu, Mtakatifu ni wewe Mungu!” Kwa ajili ya Mama wa Mungu, utuhurumie.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Nafsi yangu, uifahamu siku hiyo ngumu, uwe mwangalifu nauwashe taa na mafuta ya furaha kwa maana haujui siku wala saa ambapo utasikia kilio ikisema: “Tazama bwana arusi ali!” Ee nasfi yangu usilale ili usipatikane nje ukibisha kama wale wanawali watano wapumbavu, walakini, wewe, uwe macho ukisali ili umlaki Kristo na mafuta nzuri, na atakujaza arusi ya kweli ya utukufu wa Mungu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee Bikira Mama wa Mungu, wewe ni ua la wokozi na ngome ya kutulinda. Ubatili shauri ya uadui. Ubadilishe huzuni kwa watumishi wako kuwa furaha. Linda mji wetu, pigania wafalme wetu, na uombee amani ya ulimwengu, kwa maana wewe ndiwe tumaini letu, ewe Mama wa Mungu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee mfalme wa mbingu, mfariji, Roho wa kweli, aliye popote, na kujaza wote, hazina ya wema na mpaji wa uzima, uje kwa neema yako ee mwema na uishi ndani yangu, na utuoshe kwa uchafu wetu ee mwema na uokoe nafsi zetu.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu
Jinsi ulivyokuwa na wanafunzi wako Ee Mwokozi na ukawapa amani, uwe nasi pia na utupe amani yako, na utukomboe na utuokoe nafsi zetu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
Wakati wowote tukisimama ndani ya hekalu lako takatifu, tunalingana na waliosimama mbinguni. Ee Mama wa Mungu, wewe ni lango la mbinguni, utufungulie lango la huruma.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2)

array.name: exhourMidnight_2Watch_eng
array.item: LITANIES

Give me, Lord, fountains of many tears as You did in the past to the sinful woman. Make me worthy to shed my tears on Your feet which took me to the right path and offer You the best of perfumes. Grant me to live pure and repentant, so that I can hear a joyful voice: “Your faith has saved you”.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

When I realize the multitude of my wicked deeds, and the thought of that terrible judgement comes to my heart, a tremble takes hold of me, so I take refuge in You, O God the Lover of mankind. Do not turn your face away from me. Let me entreat You Who alone without sin. Grant my poor soul a Godly fear before the end comes and save me.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.

Heavens bless You, O full of grace, the ever Virgin Bride. We glorify Your immaculate birth of Jesus Christ which is beyond our comprehension. O Mother of God, Mother of mercy and salvation, plead for the redemption of our souls.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.

O Heavenly King, the Spirit of truth, the comforter, who is everywhere and fills everybody. You are the treasure of goodness and giver of life, we ask You to graciously come and dwell within us, purify us from iniquity and save our souls.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
Lord, abide with us as You did with the apostles, when You gave them Your peace, we ask You to grant us Your peace, our Savior; save us and spare our souls.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.
Whenever we stand in Your Holy Temple, we are considered as those who abide in heaven. O Mother of God, you are the gate of heaven, open to us the door of mercy.
O Lord Hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhourMidnight_2Watch_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Ee Bwana, unijalie chemchemi ya machozi kama vile ulivyomjali yule mwanamke mdhambi. Na unistahilishe kuosha miguu yako uliotuletea huru kutoka kwa makosa yetu. Nami nitakuletea marashi ya thamani kubwa, ili nifaidike kupata maisha masafi kupitia kwa kutubu, na niweze kusikia sauti unaojaa furaha ukiniambia, “Imani yako imekuokoa”.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Nikikumbuka moyoni mwangu, dhambi zangu nyngi, na pia hukumu inayokuja, ninaanza kutetemeka. Ninakimbilia usalama kwako, ee Mungu mpenda mwanadamu! Nakusihi siniondolee uso wako kwangu, kwani ni wewe tu hauna dhambi. Umpe nafsi maskini hofu ya kimungu kabla siku ya mwisho na uniokoe.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
Mbingu zinakusifu kwa sababu umejawa neema, bibi harusi asiyefanyiwa harusi. Nasi pia tunatukuza umama wako usioemelewa, ewe mama wa mungu, utuombee kwa ajili ya wokovu wa nafsi zetu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee mfalme wa mbingu, mfariji, Roho wa kweli, aliye popote, na kujaza wote, hazina ya wema na mpaji wa uzima, uje kwa neema yako ee mwema na uishi ndani yangu, na utuoshe kwa uchafu wetu ee mwema na uokoe nafsi zetu.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Jinsi ulivyokuwa na wanafunzi wako Ee Mwokozi na ukawapa amani, uwe nasi pia na utupe amani yako, na utukomboe na utuokoe nafsi zetu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
Wakati wowote tukisimama ndani ya hekalu lako takatifu, tunalingana na waliosimama mbinguni. Ee Mama wa Mungu, wewe ni lango la mbinguni, utufungulie lango la huruma.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhourMidnight_3Watch_eng
array.item: LITANIES

O Lord look at my weakness with a compassionate eye, for my life is nearing its end and with deeds like mine, I shall have no salvation. I pray to You, my Lord, to look with merciful eyes, at me weakness and my disgrace and my humility, and save me.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

Wake up, my soul and be careful, your judge is present. Consider the awesome time of judgement, there will be no mercy on those who did not have mercy on others. O Savior, help me, for You alone have such love for humanity.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages, Amen.

O rational gate of life, the honored Mother of God, deliver from hardships those who in faith, took refuge in you. So that we may glorify Your immaculate birth (to Christ) in everything for the salvation of our souls.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of age, Amen.

O Heavenly King, the Spirit of truth, the comforter, who is everywhere and fills everybody. You are the treasure of goodness and giver of life, we ask You to graciously come and dwell within us, purify us from iniquity and save our souls.
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
Lord, abide with us as You did with the apostles, when You gave them Your peace, we ask You to grant us Your peace, our Savior; save us and spare our souls.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.
Whenever we stand in Your Holy Temple, we are considered as those who abide in heaven. O Mother of God, you are the gate of heaven, open to us the door of mercy.
O Lord Hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: exhourMidnight_3Watch_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Ee Bwana unitazame kwa macho ya huruma kwa ajili ya mateso yangu. Maisha yangu imekaribia mwisho, na hakuna wokovu katika kazi yangu. Kwa ajili ya hayo, ninakusihi, ee Bwana, unitazame kwa macho ya huruma kwa ajili ya udhaifu wangu, taabu yangu, ugeni wangu, na umasikini wangu, na uniokoe.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Ni kama hakimu yuko mbele yake, ee nafsi yangu, uwe macho na mwangalifu na ukumbuke wakati huo wa uvamiaji; wakati hautakuwa na huruma kwa wasio na huruma katika hukumuni. Kwa hiyo, unisamehe, ee mwokozi! Ni wewe tu ndiye mpenda wanadamu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ewe lango la maisha ya busara, mama wa Mungu mwenye heshima, uwaokoe wale wanaokimbilia kwako kwa imani, ili tuweze kukutukuza umama wako safi (kwa Kristo) kwa kila jambo kwa minajili ya wokovu wa nafsi zetu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee mfalme wa mbingu, mfariji, Roho wa kweli, aliye popote, na kujaza wote, hazina ya wema na mpaji wa uzima, uje kwa neema yako ee mwema na uishi ndani yangu, na utuoshe kwa uchafu wetu ee mwema na uokoe nafsi zetu.
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Jinsi ulivyokuwa na wanafunzi wako Ee Mwokozi na ukawapa amani, uwe nasi pia na utupe amani yako, na utukomboe na utuokoe nafsi zetu.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.
Wakati wowote tukisimama ndani ya hekalu lako takatifu, tunalingana na waliosimama mbinguni. Ee Mama wa Mungu, wewe ni lango la mbinguni, utufungulie lango la huruma.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: ABSOLUTION_3h_eng
array.item: ABSOLUTION

O God of all mercies and Lord of all comfort, at all times, You bring us comfort with Your Holy Spirit. We give You thanks for raising us up for prayer at this holy hour. At this hour You poured the rich grace of Your Holy Spirit in the shape of tongues of fire on Your blessed and honorable disciples. We ask You, O Lover of mankind to accept our prayers, forgive our sins and bestow on us the grace of Your Holy Spirit. Purify us from the iniquities of the body and soul, lead us to a spiritual life so that we may seek righteousness and make us worthy to serve You with purity and goodness, through all the days of our lives, for You are worthy of glory, honor and power with the Holy Spirit now and forever, Amen.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_3h_kis
array.item: SALA YA UTAKASO

Ee Mungu wa huruma zote na Bwana wa faraja wakati wote, umetufariji kila wakati kwa Roho wako Mtakatifu. Tunakushukuru kwa kutuamsha kwa sala saa hii takatifu, uliyowajazia wanafunzi wako watakatifu na mitume wako waheshimiwa neema ya Roho wako Mtakatifu kwa umbo la ndimi za moto. Tunakuomba na tunakusihi, ewe mpenda wanadamu, ukubali sala zetu na utusamehe dhambi zetu. Na ututumie neema ya Roho wako Mtakatifu. Ututakase kwa uovu wote wa mwili pamoja na roho. Utuhamishe kwa maisha ya kiroho ili tuweze kwa roho wala hatutakamilisha tamaa ya mwili. Utustahili tuweze kukuhudumia kwa usafi na haki kwa siku zetu zote za maisha, kwani wewe unastahili utukufu, heshima na uwezo pamoja na Roho Mtakatifu sasa na wakati wote, Amina.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_6h_eng
array.item: ABSOLUTION

We give thanks to You, our Almighty King, Father of our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ; and we glorify You for You have made the hours of suffering of Your Only Begotten Son a time of prayer and comfort. Accept our supplications and remove the seal of our sins as it was broken at this holy hour, through the crucifixion of Your Only Begotten Son, the Savior of our souls, our Lord Jesus Christ, through whom You destroyed the power of evil. Lord, grant us an unblemished life of peace and goodness to please Your Holy and Glorified Name. Allow us to stand in front of the fearful judgement seat of Your Only Begotten Son, our Lord Jesus Christ, without falling into condemnation, so we may praise You with all Your saints. Eternal Father, we glorify You with Your consubstan- tial Son, and the Holy Spirit, giver of life, now and forever.AMEN.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_6h_kis
array.item: SALA YA UTAKASO

"Tunakushukuru ee Mfalme wetu na mweza wa yote, Baba wa Bwana wetu na Mungu wetu na Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo, na tunakutukuza kwa sababu umechagua muda wa mateso wa Mwanako wa pekee Yesu Kristo kuwa muda wa faraja na maombi. Ukubali dua zetu na utuondolee muhuri ya dhambi zetu kama ilivyo vunjwa saa hii takatifu, kupitia kwa msalaba wa Mwana wako wa pekee Yesu Kristo, Bwana wetu, na Mwokozi wa nafsi zetu, ambaye kupitia kwake uliteketeza uwezo wa adui. Mungu utupatie, wakati wa kung'aa na maisha yasio na doa, na uhai uliotakata ili tuweze kulipendeza Jina lako takatifu na lililo sujudiwa. Ili tusimame mbele ya kiti cha hofu cha hukumu cha Mwana wako wa Pekee, Yesu Kristo Bwana wetu, bila kuanguka katika hukumu, ili tuweze kukusifu pamoja na watakatifu wako wote. Wewe ni Baba bila mwanzo, na Mwana wako mwenye asili moja nawe, pamoja na Roho Mtakaifu mpaji wa uzima, sasa na wakati wote na milele hata milele, Amina."

array.name: ABSOLUTION_9h_eng
array.item: ABSOLUTION

O God, the Father of our Lord, God and Savior Jesus Christ, who through His appearance You saved us from slavery of the enemy. We ask You, in His blessed and glorious name, to raise our minds above worldly care and bodily desires to the remembrance of Your heavenly commandments. Fulfill Your love to humanity O God. Receive our prayers at all times and this prayer of the ninth hour. Grant us to be worthy of Your calling and when we are released from this body, may we be counted among those who kneel before Your throne and are worthy of the sufferings of Your Only Begotten Son, our Lord Jesus Christ. Grant us Your mercy, forgive us our sins and save us with the hosts of saints who sincerely pleased You ever since the beginning. Lord, cast away from us the power of the adversary and his evil hosts who were trodden by the power of the cross of Your Only- Begotten Son. Accept us, O Lord Jesus Christ, as You accepted the thief on the cross. Shine unto us the light which You gave to those who were in the darkness of Hades. Restore us all to paradise for You are blessed together with Your Father and the Holy Spirit, and worthy of glory, honor, might and obedience now and forever, Amen.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_9h_kis
array.item: SALA YA UTAKASO

"Ee Mungu, Baba wa Bwana wetu, Mungu wetu na Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo, kupitia kwa kuonekana uliyetuokoa kutoka utumwa wa adui. Tunakuomba kwa jina lake tukufu na iliyobarikiwa, utuhamisha akili zetu juu ya mambo ya dunia na tamaa za mwili na tukumbuke amri zako za kimbinguni. Timiza upendo wako kwa wanadamu, ee mwema. Pokea sala zetu wakati wote pamoja na sala hii ya saa tisa. Utuwezeshe tustahili mwito wako, na wakati tutakapoondoka katika mili zetu hizi, tuweze kuhesabiwa pamoja na wale wanao sujudu mbele ya kiti chako cha enzi na wanastahili mateso ya Mwana wako wa Pekee, Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo. Utuhurumie, utusamehe dhambi zetu na utuokoe pamoja na watakatifu walio kukupendeza tangu mwanzo na milele. Ee Mungu Ubatili nguvu zote za muovu shetani pamoja na jeshi lake, waliokanyagwa na nguvu ya msalaba ya mpaji wa uzima, ya Mwana wako wa Pekee. Utukubali Bwana wangu Yesu Kristo jinsi ulivyomkubali mnyang'anyi aliyekua mkono wa kuume uliposulubishwa msalabani. Utuangazie na mwanga kama ulioangazia wale waliokuwa katika giza la jehanamu. Uturejeshe katika sisi sote katika Paradiso ya furaha. Kwa kuwa Bwana wangu umebarikiwa pamoja na Baba yako mwema na Roho Mtakatifu, kwani unastahili utukufu, heshima, mamlaka, utiifu na kusujudiwa sasa na wakati wote na hata milele, Amina."

array.name: ABSOLUTION_11h_eng
array.item: ASOLUTION

Thank you, compassionate Lord, for You granted us to pass this day in peace, brought us thankfully to the night and made us worthy of seeing Your light until sunset. Accept this glorification, we now offer You and save us from the temptations of the enemy and defeat all his traps set against us. In this coming night, give us peace without pain or anxiety or fatigue or illusion so we may pass through the night in peace and chastity and awake to praise You and pray to You. At all times and everywhere we glorify and praise Your name, Your Father and the Holy Spirit forevermore, Amen.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_11h_kis
array.item: SALA YA UTAKASO

"Ahasante, Mfalme wetu wa huruma, kwa maana umetujalia tukapita siku hii kwa amani, ukatuleta mpaka usiku huu kwa shukrani, na ukatufanya tuweze kuona mwanga hadi wakati jua lituapo. Bwana kubali tukuzwa tunazokupa na utuokoe katika majaribu ya adui na ushinde mitego zake zote alizotuwekea. Katika usiku huu tunaoelekea sasa, tunakuomba amani bila maumivu, wasiwasi, unyong'onyevu, au uongo ili tuweze kupita usiku huu kwa amani na usafi na utuamshe tena tukusifu na kukuomba kila wakati na kila mahali popote. Tunalitukuza Jina lako takatifu pamoja na Baba asioeleweka na bila mwanzo na Roho Mtakatifu mpaji wa uzima sasa na wakati wote na milele hata milele, Amina."

array.name: ABSOLUTION_12h_eng
array.item: THR ABSOLUTION

For the sake of Your Holy name, Lord, for Your goodness and love to mankind, forgive us those sins we committed against You this day, whether they are by action, by words, by thought or any of our senses. Grant us a peaceful night and give us a sleep free of all anxiety, send us the guardian angel to protect us from every evil, temptation or the strike of the enemy, through the grace, mercy and love of Your Son, our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. Together with Him and the life giving and consubstantial Holy Spirit You are worthy of glory, honor and dominion forever and ever, Amen.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_12h_kis
array.item: SALA YA UTAKASO

Ee Bwana, dhambi zote tulizokukosea siku hii ya leo, kwa matendo au kwa maneno au kwa fikira au kwa hisia zote, tafadhali utuondolee na tusamehe kulingana na jina lako takatifu, kwa kuwa wewe ni mwema na mpenda wanadamu. Ee Mungu utujalie usiku mwema na tulivu pamoja na usingizi usio na wasiwasi. Na ututumie malaika wako wa amani atulinde kwa wovu wote, kwa mateso yote na kwa kila majaribu ya adui; kupitia kwa neema, huruma na upendo kwa wanadamu vya Mwanako wa Pekee, Bwana wetu Mungu wetu na Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo, ambaye kwake pamoja na wewe na Roho Mtakatifu, Mpaji wa uzima aliye sawa na wewe. Kwako tunakutolea utukufu, heshima na mamlaka, sasa na wakati wote na milele hata milele. Amina.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_Midnight_eng
array.item: THE ABSOLUTION

Lord Jesus Christ, Son of our eternal God, enlighten our minds to understand Your life giving words. Raise us from the darkness of mortal sin, make us worthy to be steady in virtue. When You come to judge the world, grant us to hear the joyful call: “Come you that are blessed by My Father! Come and inherit the Kingdom that has been prepared for you since the creation of the world!” Lord grant us to attend at that hour without fear, anxiety or condemnation. Do not judge us according to our sins, because You alone, have such compassion, patience and mercy. May You accept these prayers through the pleadings of the Holy Mother of God, Virgin Mary and all the saints, Amen.

array.name: ABSOLUTION_Midnight_kis
array.item: SALA YA UTAKASO

Ee Bwana Yesu Kristo, Mwana wa Mungu, anayeishi milele, umlike akili zetu ili tuweze kuelewa maneno yako ya mpaji wa uzima. Utuondoe katika giza la dhambi inayoua nafsi. Na utustahilishe kuwa na haki katika yale mambo mazuri tunaofanya. Wakati wa kuja kuhukumu ulimwengu, uturuhusu kusikia sauti yako unao furaha ukituambia: "Njooni kwangu enyi mliobarikiwa wa Baba yangu, mrithi ufalme uliotayarishwa kwa ajili yenu kabla dhahari yote". Ndio Bwana, utufundishe ili tusiwe na woga, wasiwasi wala kuanguka katika hukumu wakati huo, na usituhukumu kulingana na dhambi zetu zilizo nyingi, kwa sababu ni wewe tu uliye jawa upendo, uvumilivu na huruma nyingi; Kupitia kwa sala ya Mama yetu, Mama wa Mungu Bikira Mariamu pamoja na maombi ya watakatifu wako, Amina.

array.name: end_each_hour_eng
array.item: CONCLUDING PRAYER

Have mercy upon us O God, have mercy upon us. For You are always worshipped and glorified in heaven and on earth. O Christ, our good Lord, plenteous in patience, mercy and compassion, who loves the just and shows mercy to all sinners amongst whom I am the first. Who does not wish death for the sinner but repentance and life, calling us all to salvation for the promised forthcoming rewards. O Lord, accept our prayers of this hour and every hour. Ease our lives, and guide us to act according to Your commandments. Sanctify our souls, purify our bodies, set right our thoughts, cleanse our intentions, heal our sickness, forgive us our sins and deliver us from every evil grief and distress. Surround us with Your Holy angels that we may be guided and guarded with them to attain the unity of faith and knowledge of Your imperceptible and infinite glory, for You are blessed forever. Amen.
O Lord make us worthy to pray thankfully;

Our Father who art in heaven hallowed be Thy Name. Thy Kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. And forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from the evil one, through Christ Jesus our Lord. For Thine is the Kingdom, the Power, and the Glory forever, Amen.

array.name: end_each_hour_kis
array.item: SALA YA MWISHO WA KILA SAA

Utuonee huruma Ee Mungu na utuhurumie, wewe ambaye kila wakati na kila saa husujudiwa na kutukuzwa mbinguni na hata duniani. Kristo Mungu wetu mwema, mvumilivu, mwenye huruma nyingi na roho safi, apendaye watu wema na mwenye huruma kwa wenye dhambi ambaye mimi ni mmoja wao, wewe hupendi kifo kwa mwenye dhambi bali kuungama na kuishi, wewe uitae wote kwa wokovu kupitia ahadi nyingi zijaazo. Bwana pokea sala zetu wakati huu na wakati wowote. Rahisisha maisha yetu, na utuongoze kufanya kulingana na amri zako. Takasa roho zetu. Safisha kabisa miili yetu na urekebishe akili zetu, takasa nia zetu na uponye maradhi yetu. Utusamehe dhambi zetu, utuokoe na hasira kali na huzuni wa moyo. Utuzingire na malaika wako watakatifu ili kuongozwa na kulindwa pamoja na majeshi wao tuweze kuwa na umoja wa imani na ufahamu wa utukufu wako isiyo na kipimo na isiyo onekana. Na baraka zote ni kwako milele hata milele. Amina.
Ee Bwana tustahilishe kuomba kwa shukrani;

Baba yetu uliye mbinguni, Jina lako litukuzwe. Ufalme wako uje. Mapenzi yako yatimizwe hapa duniani kama huko mbinguni. Utupe leo riziki yetu. Utusamehe makosa yetu kama tunavyowasamehe waliotukosea. Usitutie majaribuni, lakini utuokoe na yule mwovu. Kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo, kwa kuwa Ufalme ni wako na nguvu na utukufu hata milele, Amina.

array.name: ex_each_hour_eng
array.item: HOLY HOLY HOLY

Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lord of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of Your glory and honor. God the Father Almighty, have mercy upon us. O Holy Trinity have mercy upon us. O Lord, God of hosts, be with us, for we have no other supporter in our tribulations and adversities but You. O God, absolve, remit and forgive us our sins which we have done willingly and unwillingly, and those which we committed knowingly and unknowingly, the hidden and the visible. O Lord forgive us for the sake of Your Holy Name that is called upon us, and according to Your mercy and not to our sins.
Make us worthy to pray thankfully;

Our Father who art in heaven hallowed be Thy Name. Thy Kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. And forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from the evil one, through Christ Jesus our Lord. For Thine is the Kingdom, the Power, and the Glory forever, Amen.

array.name: ex_each_hour_kis
array.item: MTAKATIFU MTAKATIFU MTAKATIFU:

Mtakatifu, mtakatifu, mtakatifu Bwana wa majeshi, mbingu na nchi zimejaa utukufu na heshima yako, utuonee huruma Ee Mungu Baba Mtawala wa wote, Ee Utatu Mtakatifu utuonee huruma, Ee Mungu, Bwana wa majeshi uwe nasi, kwani hatuna msaada katika masumbuko na taabu zetu ila wewe. Ee Mungu utuondolee na utusamehe dhambi zetu, tuliyofanya tukijua na tusiyoyajua, yaliyofichika na yaliyo dhahiri. Ee Bwana utusamehe kulingana na jina lako takatifu tuliyoitwa nayo, kwa mapenzi yako Ee Bwana, na siyo kulingana na dhambi zetu.
Ee Bwana tustahilishe kuomba kwa shukrani;

Baba yetu uliye mbinguni, Jina lako litukuzwe. Ufalme wako uje. Mapenzi yako yatimizwe hapa duniani kama huko mbinguni. Utupe leo riziki yetu. Utusamehe makosa yetu kama tunavyowasamehe waliotukosea. Usitutie majaribuni, lakini utuokoe na yule mwovu. Kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo, kwa kuwa Ufalme ni wako na nguvu na utukufu hata milele, Amina.

array.name: end_exhour12_eng
array.item: Lord

Lord, by Your grace protect us this night from sin. You are the blessed God of our fathers, your Holy name is full of glory forever, Amen. Lord, let Your mercy on us be as great as our reliance on You, because all eyes are focused upon You. You give us food in due time. Hear us, our Lord and Savior, because You are the hope of the world, You alone are able to protect and save us from this generation and even unto eternity, Amen. Blessed are You, Lord, teach me Your justice, show me Your will, enlighten me to Your goodness. Your mercy is everlasting, do not reject what You have made with Your own hands because You are my refuge from generation to generation. I cried to the Lord: “I have sinned against You, have mercy upon me and save my soul”. Save me Lord, for I am seeking You. Teach me to do Your will, for You are my Lord, you have the spring of life, through Your light we see light, let Your mercy come to those who know You and Your goodness to those who are pure in heart. Blessing, praise and glory are due to You, O Father and Son and Holy Spirit who is being since the beginning, now, and forever, Amen. It is good to confess to the Lord and to praise Your name, O Most High, Your mercy are declared in the mornings and Your justice every night.
THE TRISAGION

Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was born of the virgin. Have mercy upon us. Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was crucified for our sake. Have mercy upon us. Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who arose from the dead and ascended to the heavens. Have mercy upon us. Glory be to the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit. Now and forever more, Amen. O Holy Trinity, have mercy upon us. O Holy Trinity, have mercy upon us. O Holy Trinity, have mercy upon us. O Lord, forgive us our sins. O Lord, forgive us our trespasses. O Lord, forgive us our transgressions. O God, be with those who are sick. Heal them for the sake of Your holy name. O Lord, repose the souls of those who have passed over to You. O Lord who is without fault, have mercy upon us. Support us and accept our prayers, for Yours is the glory, honor and triple holiness. Lord have mercy. Lord have mercy. Lord bless us, Amen.
O Lord make us worthy to pray thankfully;

Our Father who art in heaven hallowed be Thy Name. Thy Kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. And forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from the evil one, through Christ Jesus our Lord. For Thine is the Kingdom, the Power, and the Glory forever, Amen.
HAIL TO SAINT MARY

Hail to Saint Mary, full of grace, the ever virgin, mother of God, mother of Christ, may you lift our prayers to your beloved Son to forgive us our sins. Hail to the holy virgin, mother of true light, Christ our Lord. May you ask our Lord to have mercy upon our souls and forgive us our sins. O Virgin Mary, mother of God, who pleads for mankind, pray for the forgiveness of our sins before Christ to whom you gave birth. Hail to you, O Virgin and true queen, Hail to the pride of mankind, mother of Emmanuel, remember us O faithful pleader, before our Lord Jesus Christ, may He forgive us our sins.
INTRODUCTION TO THE CREED

We honor you, Mother of True Light and glorify you, O Holy Virgin Mother of God, for you gave birth to the Savior of the World. He came and saved our souls. Glory to You, our Master and King Jesus Christ, Pride of the Apostles, Crown of the Martyrs, Joy of the righteous, Steadiness of the churches, Remission of sins. We preach the Holy Trinity, the One Divinity, whom we worship and honor. Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy, Lord bless us, Amen.
THE CREED

Truly we believe in One God, the Almighty God, the Father, maker of heaven and earth, of all things visible and invisible. We believe in one Lord, Jesus Christ the only begotten Son of God, born of the Father before all ages; light out of light, true God out of true God, begotten not made; consubstantial with the Father, through whom all things came into being. He descended from heaven for us and for our salvation, and was incarnated from the Holy Spirit and of the Virgin Mary, and became man. He was crucified for us at the time of Pontius Pilate. He suffered and was buried; arose from the dead on the third day in accordance with the Scriptures; He ascended to the heavens and sat at the right hand of the Father; He shall also come in His glory to judge the living and the dead; of whose kingdom there will be no end. Truly we believe in the Holy Spirit, the Life giving Lord, who proceeds from the Father, we worship and glorify Him together with the Father and the Son, who spoke in the prophets. And in one, holy, universal and Apostolic Church. We acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins. And we look for the resurrection of the dead and the life of the world to come, Amen.
O Lord Hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: end_exhour12_kis
array.item: Ee Bwana

Ee Bwana, utulinde usiku huu dhidi ya dhambi kwa neema yako. Umebarikiwa ee Mungu wa baba zetu, jina lako takatifu limejaa utukufu milele hata milele. Amina. Ee Bwana, ebu neema zako kwetu ziwe kuu jinsi tunavyo kutegemea wewe, kwa sababu macho yote yanakutazama kwa matumaini yao. Wewe hutupa chakula kwa wakati unaofaa. Utusikie ee Mungu na Mwokozi wetu, kwa kuwa wewe ndiwe tumaini la ulimwengu, ni wewe tu una uwezo wa kutulinda na kutuokoa kutoka kizazi hiki na hata milele, Amina. Wewe ni Bwana mbarikiwa, unifundishe adili zako, unioneshe haki yako, uniangazie wema wako, neema zako hazina mwisho. Usikatae kazi ya mikono yako kwa sababu wewe ndiwe kimbilio langu kutoka kizazi hata kizazi. Nilimsihi Bwana nikisema; “Nimekukosea wewe, ee Bwana, kwa hivyo unihurumie na uokoe nafsi yangu.” Ee Bwana uniokoe kwa maana nimekukosea wewe. Bwana nimekukimbilia uniokoe, unifundishe nifanye mapenzi yako, kwa maana wewe ni Mungu wangu, na kwako kuna chemchemi ya uzima. Kwa mwanga wako ndio tutaona mwanga. Hebu huruma zako zifikie wanaokutambua, na haki yako kwa wanyofu wa moyo. Kwa kuwa kwako kuna baraka, sifa na utukufu, ee Baba, Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu yupo tangu mwanzo sasa na wakati wote hata milele, Amina. Ni vema kukiri mbele ya Bwana, na kuimba sifa kwa jina lako Ee wewe uliye mkuu zaidi; utuoneshe huruma zako kila asubuhi na haki zako kila usiku.
UTUKUFU WA UTATU MTAKATIFU

Mtakatifu Mungu, Mtakatifu Mwenyezi, Mtakatifu aishiye milele. Aliyezaliwa na bikira Maria utuhurumie. Mtakatifu Mungu, Mtakatifu Mwenyezi, Mtakatifu aishiye milele. Aliyesulubiwa kwa ajili yetu utuhurumie. Mtakatifu Mungu, Mtakatifu Mwenyezi, Mtakatifu aishiye milele. Aliyefufuka kutoka kwa wafu na kupaa mbinguni tuhurumie. Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu, sasa na wakati wote na milele milele, Amina. Ee Utatu Mtakatifu tuhurumie. Ee Utatu Mtakatifu tuhurumie. Ee Utatu Mtakatifu tuhurumie. Bwana tusamehe dhambi zetu, Bwana tusamehe hatia zetu, Bwana tusamehe makosa yetu, Bwana yafikie magonjwa ya watu wako, uwaponye kwa ajili ya jina lako takatifu. Baba zetu na ndugu zetu waliolala uwafariji nafsi zao. Ee wewe usiye na hatia Bwana tuhurumie, Ee wewe usiye na hatia utusaidie na uzikubali sala zetu kwako, kwa kuwa utukufu wa utatu ni kwako, Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana utubariki, Amina.
Ee Bwana tustahilishe kuomba kwa shukrani;

Baba yetu uliye mbinguni, Jina lako litukuzwe. Ufalme wako uje. Mapenzi yako yatimizwe hapa duniani kama huko mbinguni. Utupe leo riziki yetu. Utusamehe makosa yetu kama tunavyowasamehe waliotukosea. Usitutie majaribuni, lakini utuokoe na yule mwovu. Kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo, kwa kuwa Ufalme ni wako na nguvu na utukufu hata milele, Amina.
SALAMU KWA MTAKATIFU MARIA

Salamu kwako. Twakuomba Ee mtakatifu uliyejaa utukufu, Bikira daima, mama wa Mungu, mama yake Kristo, uyainue maombi yetu kwa mwanao mpendwa, ili aweze kutusamehe dhambi zetu. Salamu kwako Bikira mtakatifu uliyetuzalia Mwanga wa kweli, Kristo Bwana wetu, umwombe Bwana kwa niaba yetu ili aweze kutuhurumia na kutusamehe dhambi zetu. Ee Bikira Maria, mama wa Mungu, mtakatifu na mwombezi mwaminifu wa jamii za watu, tuombee kwa niaba yetu mbele ya Kristo uliyemzaa kwamba tuwezeshe kupokea msamaha wa dhambi zetu. Salamu kwako Bikira, malkia wa kweli, salamu kwa ajili ya haja za mataifa, ambaye kwa ajili yetu ulimzaa Imanueli. Twakuomba mwombezi mwaminifu, utukumbuke mbele ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ili aweze kutusamehe dhambi zetu.
UTANGULIZI WA KANUNI YA IMANI

Tunakukuza ee mama wa Mwanga wa kweli; na tunakusifu ee mama mtakatifu mama wa Mungu. Kwani umetuzalia Mwokozi wa ulimwengu nzima. Aliyekuja na kuokoa nafsi zetu. Utukufu uwe kwako ee Kristo Bwana wetu na Mfalme wetu; heshima ya mitume, taji la mashahidi, furaha kwa wenye haki, uthabiti wa makanisa, na uondoleo la dhambi. Tunaeza na kuhubiri utatu Mtakatifu, tabia ya Mungu mmoja. Tunamsujudia na umtukuza. Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana utuletee baraka zako. Amina.
KANUNI YA IMANI

Kweli tunasadiki kwa Mungu mmoja, Mungu Baba Mtawala wa wote, aliyeumba mbingu na nchi, na vitu vyote vinavyoonekana na vile visivyoonekana. Pia tunasadiki kwa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo, Mwana wa pekee wa Mungu, aliyezaliwa kutoka kwa Baba kabla ya dhahiri yote. Mwanga kutoka Mwanga, Mungu kweli kutoka Mungu kweli. Aliyezaliwa wala si kuumbwa; aliye sawa na Baba, kwa yeye vitu vyote vilifanyika. Huyu ndiye kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu na kwa wokovu wetu alishuka kutoka mbinguni, alipata umbo la mtu kutoka kwa Roho Mtakatifu na kwa Bikira Maria na akawa mwanadamu. Akasulubiwa kwa ajili yetu wakati wa Pontio Pilato, akateswa na kuzikwa, akafufuka siku ya tatu kutoka kwa wafu kama ilivyoandikwa kwenye maandiko matakatifu. Akapaa mbinguni, akaketi kulia kwa Baba, na atakuja tena katika utukufu wake kuwaamua wazima na wafu; na ufalme wake hautakuwa na mwisho. Ndiyo tunasadiki kwa Roho Mtakatifu, Bwana Mpaji wa uzima aliyetoka kwa Baba, tumsujudie na kumtukuza pamoja na Baba na Mwana, aliyesema katika manabii. Na Kanisa Moja la Pekee, Takatifu, la Mitume, Ulimwenguni. Tunakiri ubatizo moja wa uondoleo la dhambi. Tunangojea ufufuko wa wafu na uzima wa dhahiri ijayo, Amina.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).

array.name: creed_eng
array.item: THE CREED

Truly we believe in One God, the Almighty God, the Father, maker of heaven and earth, of all things visible and invisible. We believe in one Lord, Jesus Christ the only begotten Son of God, born of the Father before all ages; light out of light, true God out of true God, begotten not made; consubstantial with the Father, through whom all things came into being. He descended from heaven for us and for our salvation, and was incarnated from the Holy Spirit and of the Virgin Mary, and became man. He was crucified for us at the time of Pontius Pilate. He suffered and was buried; arose from the dead on the third day in accordance with the Scriptures; He ascended to the heavens and sat at the right hand of the Father; He shall also come in His glory to judge the living and the dead; of whose kingdom there will be no end. Truly we believe in the Holy Spirit, the Life-giving Lord, who proceeds from the Father, we worship and glorify Him together with the Father and the Son, who spoke in the prophets. And in one, holy, universal and Apostolic Church. We acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins. And we look for the resurrection of the dead and the life of the world to come, Amen
O Lord Hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).

array.name: creed_kis
array.item: KANUNI YA IMANI

Kweli tunasadiki kwa Mungu mmoja, Mungu Baba Mtawala wa wote, aliyeumba mbingu na nchi, na vitu vyote vinavyoonekana na vile visivyoonekana. Aliyezaliwa wala si kuumbwa; aliye sawa na Baba, kwa yeye vitu vyote vilifanyika. Huyu ndiye kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu na kwa wokovu wetu alishuka kutoka mbinguni, alipata umbo la mtu kutoka kwa Roho Mtakatifu na kwa Bikira Maria na akawa mwanadamu. Akasulubiwa kwa ajili yetu wakati wa Pontio Pilato, akateswa na kuzikwa, akafufuka siku ya tatu kutoka kwa wafu kama ilivyoandikwa kwenye maandiko matakatifu. Akapaa mbinguni, akaketi kulia kwa Baba, na atakuja tena katika utukufu wake kuwaamua wazima na wafu; na ufalme wake hautakuwa na mwisho. Ndiyo tunasadiki kwa Roho Mtakatifu, Bwana mpaji wa uzima aliyetoka kwa Baba, tumsujudia na kumtukuza pamoja na Baba na Mwana, aliyesema katika manabii. Na Kanisa Moja la Pekee, Takatifu, la Mitume, Ulimwenguni. Tunakiri ubatizo moja wa uondoleo la dhambi. Tunangojea ufufuko wa wafu na uzima wa dhahiri ijayo, Amina.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).
